name: Super Off Road
overview: Grab the wheel of your Toyota super-truck and hit the gas! Based on the #1 arcade game, Super Off-Road is all-out dirt-grinding, high-gear competition. Watch out for the mud holes, jumps and other obstacles on the 16 different Mickey Thompson Stadium Off-Road track from match offs to spin-outs, Super Off-Road is as close to genuine short-course racing as you can get! Race against a friend and two computer-controlled trucks simultaneously! Race through 64 different track configurations! Trade in your winnings for accessories at the Spec Shop and improve your chances for victory!
